param.name: dashesCount
param.para: The element count of the array in the dashes argument.

param.name: startIndex
param.para: The index of the first dash to retrieve.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

param.name: dashesCount
param.para: The element count of the array in the dashes argument.

param.name: startIndex
param.para: The index of the first dash to retrieve.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Gets the number of the dashes in the array.

returns.para: Returns the number of the dashes in the array.

summary.para: Removes dashes from the end of the array.

param.name: dashesCount
param.para: Specifies how many dashes to remove.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Updates the array. Existing dashes not updated by this method are preserved. The array is resized larger if necessary to accommodate the new dashes.

param.name: dashesCount
param.para: The number of dashes to update.

param.name: startIndex
param.para: The index at which to begin updating dashes. Must be less than or equal to the size of the array.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Updates the array. Existing dashes not updated by this method are preserved. The array is resized larger if necessary to accommodate the new dashes.

param.name: dashesCount
param.para: The number of dashes to update.

param.name: startIndex
param.para: The index at which to begin updating dashes. Must be less than or equal to the size of the array.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Interface describing an SVG stroke-dasharray value.
